entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
